scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file output.yaml --s3-bucket api-lambda-stripe-payment-bucket
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yaml --stack-name api-lambda-stripe-payment --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides TableName=$npm_package_config_stripe_secret_key
scripts.qd: npm run package && npm run deploy
